alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 30 at 8:40PM CDT until April 03 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in St Louis MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Sullivan. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Sullivan. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.5 feet, Cave Road begins flooding at Onondaga Cave State Park near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 6.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 13.7 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Meramec River Sullivan 11.0 6.7 Wed 8 pm 12.7 12.8 9.2 7.1 6.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
